entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is able to see visions shared with Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, whose mind Harry can see into.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort share visions of each other's minds.
Harry has a conversation with Hermione, in which he tells her that he prizes the connection between himself and Voldemort.
Harry observes Ron taking charge as the weeks go by.
Voldemort and Harry share visions of each other's minds.
